from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
#Enter the computations here
A man is riding on a flatcar traveling at a constant speed of v1. He wishes to throw a ball through a stationary hoop at h above the height of his hands in such a manner that the ball will move horizontally as it passes through the hoop. He throws the ball with a speed of v2 with respect to himself. The angle between \(\vec{v}_{2}\) and the horizontal, \(\theta_{cart}\), is unknown.
Part 1. At what horizontal distance in front of the hoop must he release the ball?
\([(2gh)^{1/2}/g-v_1^2/g]^{1/2}\;(v_2^2/g)^{1/2}\)
\([(v_2^2-2gh)^{1/2}+v_1]\;(v_1^2/g)\)
\([(v_2^2-2gh)^{1/2}+v_1]\;(2gh)^{1/2}/g\)
\([(2gh)^{1/2}+v_1]\;(2gh)^{1/2}/g\)
None of the Above
Part 2.When the ball leaves the man's hands, what is the direction of its velocity relative to the frame of reference of the flatcar? To indicate the direction calculate the angle \(\theta_{cart}\) between the velocity vector measured from the flatcar and the horizontal
\(\tan^{-1}(\frac{(2gh)^{1/2}}{v_2})\)
\(\tan^{-1}(\frac{v_1}{(2gh)^{1/2}})\)
\(\tan^{-1}( \frac{(2gh)^{1/2}}{(v_2^2-2gh)^{1/2}} )\)
\( \tan^{-1}(\frac{(2gh)^{1/2}-v_2^2}{v_1})\)
None of the Above
